data.title: Lope de Vega
data.text:
LOPE DE VEGA Champion 3YO in France in 2010 (9½f to 11f). 4 wins-2 at 2-from 1400m to 2100m, €1,188,085, Chantilly Prix du Jockey Club, Gr.1, Longchamp Poule d'Essai des Poulains, Gr.1, Prix Al Khor, Deauville Prix de Montaigu, 3d Longchamp Prix de Fontainebleau, Gr.3, 4th Longchamp Prix Jean-Luc Lagardere, Gr.1. He entered stud in Ireland in 2011. He entered stud in Aust. in 2011. Champion Sire in Singapore in 2021. Sire of 1309 progeny to race, 924 winners (70.0%), earnings of over $151 million, 135 stakes winners, 96 stakes placegetters, inc.

SANTA ANA LANE (12g, Fastnet Rock, Gulch). Champion Sprinter in Australia in 2018-19.10 wins to 1400m, A$8,071,211, HK$912,000, ATC TJ Smith S., Gr.1, VRC Sprint Classic, Gr.1, BRC Stradbroke H., Gr.1, SAJC Goodwood H., Gr.1, MRC Sir Rupert Clarke S., Gr.1, ATC Premiere S., Gr.2, MRC Zeditave S., Gr.3, Murrumbidgee TC Wagga Wagga Town P., 2d ATC TJ Smith S., Gr.1, VRC Gilgai S., Gr.2, ATC South Pacific Classic, L, The Everest, 3d SAJC DC McKay S., Gr.3, MRC Heath S., Gr.3, Testa Rossa S., L, Regal Roller S., L, ATC E-Group Security H., 4th HKJC Chairman's Sprint Prize, Gr.1, MRC Gothic S., L, MVRC Abell S., L, Bendigo Bank H., L.

Champion Older Female Miler in France & GB in 2022.6 wins from 1400m to 1850m, £199,331, €405,980, ParisLongchamp Prix du Moulin de Longchamp, Gr.1, Prix d'Ispahan, Gr.1, Newmarket Dahlia S., Gr.2, Ascot Valiant S., Gr.3, Betfred Fillies' H., 2d Ascot Tote+ Fillies' H., 3d Newmarket Sun Chariot S., Gr.1, 4th Newbury Hungerford S., Gr.2.
